name: Revenge Of the Psychotronic Man - In Session From Maida Vale 7"EP
description:
**EXTREMELY LIMITED STOCK AVAILABLE**

This 7” vinyl includes all four tracks recorded at the famous Maida Vale studios in June 2013. The session was recorded for Mike Davies and the Radio One punk show and was aired in July 2013. This also led to airplay on 6 Music and Steve Lamacq picking a Revenge Of… track as one of his 5 favourite independent tracks of 2013, for a limited edition vinyl, which was released at the 2013 AIM Awards.

The tracks include ‘An Aggressive Lecture’ and ’15 Million Merits’ from the 2012 ‘Shattered Dreams parkway’ album, ‘Needles To Say’ from the sold out 2009 ‘Make Pigs Smoke’ album and a cover of TNS label mates and agro-folkers, Bootscraper – ‘The Suffering’.

Coreleased by Boss Tuneage with TNS Records (UK) 5 Feet Under (Denmark), and Entes Anomicos (Germany) 

This 7" is retailing higher than our usual 7" price due to the additional licensing fee paid to the BBC In order to release this

name: Terminus - Graveyard Of Dreams CD
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

TERMINUS were one of the most innovative and in some ways under-rated bands of the underground hardcore punk scene of the late 80s and into the 90s. The band released two albums on the Words Of Warning label, and various single releases throughout that period. “GRAVEYARD OF DREAMS” is a compilation of those singles, originally released by Boss Tuneage back in 2003, the CD has been unavailable commercially for almost a decade. After many requests for a repressing over the past few years, it is now finally made available again with re-done artwork as part of the Boss Tuneage Retro series, and ties in with reissues of the two TERMINUS albums planned for early 2014.

FORMAT: CD

TRACKLIST:

1.Star Born Thing 2.Purge 3.Kill Mechanism 4.Dance With The Dead 5.In Another Time 6.Hunt The Hunt 7.What Kind Of World? 8.Violent Resistance 9.We're Dreaming? 10.Terror Is The Best Of Guards 11.Into The Flames 12.Bending The Rules 13.A New Tomorrow 14.Body Count '91 15.Dark Carnival 16.News From Nowhere 17.What Do You Want From Me 18.Marat 19.Bonus Track

name: The Dead On - The Dead On CD
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!!** ABOUT:

THE NEW PROJECT FROM RUDY FROM WOOLWORTHY! Many bands are born from the ashes of previous bands but try to shake their pasts. Well, The Dead On embrace their previous musical lives and set out to shake the rafters instead. Formed from Chicago stalwart greats Woolworthy and The Reputation, The Dead On embody modern rock n roll with big, dirty guitar hooks, snotty slash and burn riffs and ultra catchy melodies. They are on a mission to make great Rock N Roll and to make Rock N Roll great again. The debut album by The Dead On will knock you out and then hold your hand and make it all better. Guitar riffs catchy enough to work their way into your pleasure spot; all done with heart-pounding energy – like an 80s post punk band crossed with the Stones/Thin Lizzy and then transported to the present, THE DEAD ON are on target with this debut!

FORMAT: CD

1. We Are All Alive 2. I’m Gonna Destroy You 3. She Is All The Rage 4. It’s Lonely Where You Are 5. Hold Me In Suspension 6. Little Things 7. You Can’t Do Anything About Anything (You Can’t Do Anything About) 8. You Make My Love Grow 9. Nobody Loves You Like The Devil Do 10. I Know You By Heart

description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

The missing link between RIPCORD and VIOLENT ARREST – DUMBSTRUCK’s first two releases from the turn of the millennium are now remixed, re-mastered and reissued on CD for the first time. Featuring UK hardcore punk alumni from RIPCORD, HERESY, FILTHKICK, NAPALM DEATH and CAN’T DECIDE, with half of the band currently featuring in VIOLENT ARREST, and with the added bonus of two cover versions from the sessions not featured on the original vinyl, “IT’S STILL BROKE – THE FIRST TWO RECORDS” is a juggernaut of hardcore punk rock!

name: HDQ - Lost In Translation Limited Edition Col Vinyl LP with Download Code
description:
**SOLD OUT!!** ABOUT:

HDQ need little introduction to anyone who knows anything about UK punk rock. The hugely successful band from Sunderland were one of the leading lights of the late 80s hardcore punk scene and one of the first to openly be influenced by the melodic sounds of the mid 80s American hardcore punk bands. After numerous tours and the release of three critically acclaimed albums, two Peel Sessions, plus seven inch and twelve inch singles, 75% of the band went on with Frankie Stubbs to form LEATHERFACE and have even more success over the years. Now, David Golledge (Vocals), Dickie Hammond (Guitar) have reunited with Skruff Owen (ex LEATHERFACE – Drums)*, Mick Jones (guitar) and Dean Liddle (bass) to record the first new HDQ album in 23 years – and “Lost In Translation” does not disappoint – its everything you would want and expect from an HDQ album in the 21st century, Golly’s vocals have never sounded better, and complement the unmistakable guitar sound of Dickie Hammond to a tee. You need this!! Available on CD Format (which features bonus track "Toronto" from the recent 7") or Limited Edition Coloured Vinyl LP with Download Code *Skruff is the current drummer of HDQ replacing Lainey who appears on 4 of the recorded tracks In Germany, Austria and Switzerland order from Rookie Records

FORMAT: Limited Edition Coloured Vinyl LP with Download Code

name: Extreme Noise Terror / Chaos UK - Earslaughter Split LP Reissue
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!! PLEASE NOTE SPLATTER VERSION IS NOW SOLD OUT, BLACK VINYL COPIES ONLY!** ABOUT:

The “EARSLAUGHTER” split LP between EXTREME NOISE TERROR and CHAOS UK Is widely regarded as one of the seminal and defining albums of the mid/late 80s UK Hardcore punk scene. Originally released in 1987, it was first release for the Manic Ears label, and also the first recorded release for EXTREME NOISE TERROR. Now this classic is made available again on vinyl for the first time in nearly 2 decades, and also features two extra ENT tracks taken from the “North Atlantic Noise Attack” comp LP. A corelease with Farewell Records in Germany, we have just 150 copies available on yellow black splatter vinyl, so make sure to choose that option or if not there is black vinyl too!

name: Thirty Six Strategies - Strategy One CD
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

“ Strategy One” is the debut release by THIRTY SIX STRATEGIES. It features six amazing tracks, which were originally intended for release as two seven inch singles, but when the label concerned flaked Boss Tuneage was more than happy to step in and rush-release all six on this cheap price CD! Coupling veterans from the hardcore punk scene from bands such as STAMPING GROUND, SHUTDOWN, DECADENCE WITHIN amongst many others, and featuring the wonderful vocals of Kirsty, someone described them recently as “Debbie Harry singing for DAG NASTY” which isn’t too far off the mark! The band have already had introducing features in the national press (Terrorizer and Big Cheese) and already in their short existence had some high profile support slots including the likes of GRANT HART and NO MEANS NO “Strategy One” is an immense debut that delivers the goods, but also promises lots more to come!

name: Jaded Eyes - Gods And Monsters CD
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

“ Gods And Monsters” is the debut album by Leeds’ JADED EYES, who although a relatively new band , feature members who have been active in the punk scene for many years, in bands such as VOORHEES, THE HORROR, JOHN HOLMES, DEAD PETS, SEX MANIACS, GEOFFREY OI!COTT and many many more. Sharing a collective love of the Dischord sounds of the likes of DAG NASTY and GOVERNMENT ISSUE (a song by whom the band took their name from – GI vocalist John Stabb is a fan!) - and mixing them with the home grown UK guitar driven punk sounds of the likes of THE RUTS, THE DAMNED and HDQ, JADED EYES have created a driving energetic debut that rocks – and needs to be heard!

name: Desecrator - Subconscious Release Ltd Col Vinyl LP
description:
**IN STOCK NOW! STRICTLY LIMITED TO 300 COPIES!**

ABOUT:

“Subconscious Release” was the solitary album by DESECRATOR, and was originally released in January 1991. Since that time it has become somewhat of an old school death metal gem – the original vinyl album commands a high second hand price and is highly sought after, as it was only originally pressed in a small limited amount. This is a shining example of early UK Death Metal, with a style similar to somewhere between early DEATH, AUTOPSY and PARADISE LOST. Now more than two decades on, “Subconscious Release” is made available again as part of the series of classic late 80s/early 90s metal reissues by Mosh Tuneage, 
Folloowing on from last years CD reissue,  this is a must own for all fans of the death genre - a limited eidion dark blue vinyl LP with printed insert and heavyweight sleeve, limited to just 300 copies, released in conjunction with At War With False Noise

FORMAT: Ltd Edition Coloured Vinyl LP

The hugely successful band from Sunderland were one of the leading lights of the late 80s hardcore punk scene and one of the first to openly be influenced by the melodic sounds of the mid 80s American hardcore punk bands. name: Blocko - South London Vs The World Double CD plus Bonus DVD!
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

At the turn of the millennium, South London’s BLOCKO were one of the most respected bands on the flourishing UK underground punk scene. Taking influence from the likes of LEATHERFACE, BROCCOLI, MEGA CITY 4 and DRIVE the band soon developed their trademarked sound - referred lovingly to as “Oimo” - and released a 7”, mini CD and album on Boss Tuneage between 1999-2003 plus a couple of split 7” on other labels inc Snuffy Smile and Waterslide in Japan - as well as embarking on many gigs and tours , including Japan, North America and two excursions around Europe with STRIKE ANYWHERE and HOT WATER MUSIC. Ten years on from their demise, “South London Vs The World” is a comprehensive discography of everything BLOCKO recorded – Disc 1 being the South London disc and featuring all the recordings made at RMS Studios in their South London homeland, whereas Disc 2 features unearthed alternative mixes of the “Edmondson Avenue” album tracks recorded over in the USA with Matt Smith (STRIKE ANYWHERE) which have previously never been released in this form, plus various live recordings from Belfast. Featuring unseen photos, and liner notes from both the band and Sean Forbes (Rough Trade), this is a fitting document to this great band. Mailorder Copies bought direct from Boss Tuneage only come With A Bonus DVDR of Live Footage from the Camden Underworld!

Mailorder Bonus:
Buy this Double CD from Boss Tuneage and also receive an exclusive bonus Live DVD-R for free

FORMAT: Double CD with bonus DVD

description:
New On Waterslide Records

FOR FANS OF: LOOKOUT RECORDS、MUTANT POP RECORDS、90′s POP PUNK、MR. T EXPERIENCE、THE QUEERS、PARASITES etc 

If you were diggin' the records in the mid 90's, the artwork on this release tells you something. Yes, this is it. Mutant Pop records were run by Timbo in Ohio state in the US during mid 90's. They introduced so many good underground pop punkers in the US scene, and tons of people were influenced  by them. Yeah, even DILLINGER Four put out a 7" on Mutant Pop in the early days. Heavily influenced by the Mutant Pop label artwork, THE HUM HUMS debut album is the main focus on new fresh Japanese pop punk scene. This adventure is co-produced with Shimoji from Japanese best pop punk band THE DISGUSTEENS - here's The HUM HUMS!. They are from Tokyo, and observed as a best new comer in Japan today. This is their first full-length. If you dig in LOOKOUT! bands from the 90's like MR. T EXPERIENCE and THE QUEERS, you will love this band and understand POP PUNK is not Dead yet!

It even includes a BAY CITY ROLLERS cover !! (“Remember”)

name: Joyce McKinney Experience - Love Songs For Kirk Double CD
description:
ABOUT:

BACK IN STOCK AFTER SOME COPIES RETURNED FROM A DISTRIBUTOR! For the first time JOYCE McKINNEY EXPERIENCE are available on CD! This is a stunning 45 track double CD compiles everything the band recorded, and features 21 tracks that have never been released on any format before!! CD1 contains the bands classic vinyl output from the late 80s - "Joyce Offspring" LP, "Boring Rock" 7"EP and "Cuddle This" 12" EP as well as the bands solitary Peel Session from 1988. CD2 contains the bands original demo from 1987 (four tracks of which were featured on the "Shall We Dance" 4 band comp LP), as well asthe bands EMI and Braemar Demos from 1992, which, until now, have remained unreleased on any format! The CD comes with a mighty 20 page booklet featuring all lyrics, band liner notes and tons of previoulsy unseen photos. A must for lovers of female fronted punk, or late 80s UK Melodic Hardcore! Members of the JOYCE McKINNEY EXPERIENCE also featured in DEPRAVED, VISIONS OF CHANGE and IDENTITY.

name: Visions Of Change / The Depraved - Double CD with bonus DVDR!
description:
IN STOCK NOW!

ABOUT:

BACK IN STOCK AFTER SOME COPIES RETURNED FROM A DISTRIBUTOR! Focused around the nucleus of brothers Ian and Lee Murphy, THE DEPRAVED hailed from Leamington Spa and were one of the pioneer UK hardcore punk bands in the mid 80s. As their style developed and matured, the band renamed themselves as VISIONS OF CHANGE. Now for the first time their recordings are reissued and made available on CD for the first time as part of the acclaimed Boss Tuneage Retro Series. The digitally remastered double CD contains a mammoth 51 tracks, including both Depraved albums, the debut Visions Of Change album, the bands solitary Peel Session, 6 previously unreleased demo tracks plus a comp LP-only track! 10 tracks in total have never been officially released before, and all 51 appear on CD for the first time! Features a big 24 page booklet with liner notes from noted punk author Ian Glasper, as well as lyrics and many unseen photos from the bands personal collection. (Please note - the peel session tracks only appear exclusively on the CD version, and not on the download version available on ITunes!). Please note as an exclusive with copies purchased directly from the Boss Tuneage webstore, a bonus 35 min DVDR (PAL only - but will play on compuers in NTSC regions!) of THE DEPRAVED caught live at London's Fulham Greyhound on 18/10/1986 will be included as well! - only available in the copies sold directly by us from this webstore!

name: HDQ - Hung Drawn And Quartered/You Suck! CD with download & DVDR
description:
ABOUT:

BACK IN STOCK AFTER SOME COPIES RETURNED FROM A DISTRIBUTOR! HDQ were one of the most influential and important UK Hardcore punk bands of the late 80s. Hailing from Sunderland the band were one of the first UK bands to openly embrace the US hardcore scene and members of the band went on to form the legends that are LEATHERFACE. The third and final part of Boss Tuneage’s HDQ reissue trilogy, “HUNG DRAWN AND QUARTERED/YOU SUCK” contains 30 tracks, clocking in at 2 seconds shy of 80 minutes, and compiles the bands original “Hung Drawn And Quartered”12” EP alongside debut album “You Suck” , the bands “Believe” 7” and six further previously unreleased demo tracks – a grand total of 15 tracks previously unavailable on CD! The band reform for a one off show at this years Rebellion Festival – their first show in 20 years. All tracks have been digitally remastered and the massive 20 page booklet contains all lyrics, as well as sleeve notes from bass player Rob Bewick and original vocalist Steve Pyle, as well as a vast array of unseen photos and memorabilia from the bands personal collection. In addition, copies ordered directly from our webstore will also come with an exclusive download code to extra demo tracks we couldn't fit on the CDs as well as bonus DVDR featuring some classic live footage!

FORMAT: CD with mailorder exclusive bonus download code and live DVDR!

description:
FOR FANS OF: JAWBREAKER、DILLINGER 4、OFF WITH THEIR HEADS、SAMIAM、THUMBS、SICK SICK BIRDS

Dead Mechanical is a sad/melodic punk rock band from Baltimore, MD. Formed in the Winter/Spring of 2006. Lucas was in CHARLIE BROWN GETS A VALENTINE and FESTIPALS. Matt was in SICK SICK BIRDS and FESTIPALS. They have released records on Toxic Pop Records, Traffic St. Records, and Art of the Underground Records. Now they are on Waterslide records. This is their third album and the best album so far! Bands like Jawbreaker and Superchunk still hold down the foundation for the sound here, but this threesome has really come into their own with their songwriting, both musically and lyrically. The vinyl version is released by Toxic Pop Records in America with the CD version being exclusively worldwide on Waterslide Records.

description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

New release on Waterslide Records, Japan FOR FANS OF: LEATHERFACE, BLOCKO, MERCURY LEAGUE, LATTERMAN, IRON CHIC Bear trade is punk band based in Sunderland in the North East of England, the land of LEATHERFACE. They already toured US and played at NO IDEA’s THE FEST in Gainesville, Florida. Some songs are on 7" from EVERYTHING SUCKS RECORDS in UK, and all 6 songs are on cassette tape from DEAD BROKE REKERDS in US. But the six songs on this CD have all been remixed and remastered exclusively for this release. So this means their sounds are more powerful and driving. BEAR TRADE features ex members from BLOCKO, SOUTHPORT, BROKEN FEW, FORMER CELL MATES, THE MERCURY LEAGUE, RUIN YOU and more. They are now recording for the first full length album which will be out by the end of this year on Waterslide. If you are into old good UK melodic punk rock, here's the answer.

FOR FANS OF: 90's Melodic Punk, KRUPTED PEASANT FARMERZ, ANGRY FOR LIFE, WHISKY SUNDAY, ASTA KASK, STREBERS, RADIOAKITIVA RAKERS, TRALL PUNK, 

Out of the ashes of 90's US melodic hardcore legend KRUPTED PEASANT FARMERZ, the Frazer brothers are back together! You see them on the compilation album from LOOKOUT!, Shredder, and alike. Their discography album was put out by COLDFRONT records in US. Sadly, KPF called it a day while their popularity is at the highest level.
But after they called it a day, people keep digging in their records, and people are waiting them together.
The members went on to ANGRY FOR LIFE and WHISKEY SUNDAY, and released a tons of records on several labels around the world. Finally, they're back as UTTER FAILURE. This is a must have for KPF fans!
Sounds between SCREECHING WEASEL crashes ARTICLE OF FAITH. Great guitar riffs, political lyrics,
angry but sad melodies at the same time. This is the band who breaks the sound borderline for
pop punk, melodic hardcore, and hardcore fans.

description:
**SOLD OUT FROM US - A CORELEASE WITH SPEEDOWAX AND BRASSNECK RECORDS - TRY THEM INSTEAD**
• For Fans of : LEATHERFACE, HUSKER DU, BROCCOLI. HOOTON 3 CAR, DRIVE, BLOCKO, MANIFESTO JUKEBOX, TAANG ERA LEMONHEADS, CHINA DRUM etc etc The UK has been waiting a few years for a band to take up the mantle and carry on the fine tradition of melancholic melodic punk rock that started with the likes of LEATHERFACE, HOOTON 3 CAR, DRIVE and was carried through in later years by the likes of CHINA DRUM, BROCCOLI and BLOCKO. Little did we know though we were looking in the wrong country! CHESTNUT ROAD (named after the BROCCOLI song) are from France but wear their inspiration from all those UK bands firmly on their chest, and taking influence from the likes of HUSKER DU and Taang Era LEMONHEADS as well, have managed to do where so many fail in this genre – actually make a record that is class, and that is uniquely CHESTNUT ROAD – some bands just have that knack of taking the “same old thing” and making it better, and CHESTNUT ROAD’s debut shows they are definitely one of those bands! Limited Edition Cololured Vinyl (300 Copies) with insert and heavyweight sleeve TRACKLIST Side A 1. Far 2. Apathy 3. Sunday 4. Old Picture 5. Ground Collapse Side B 1. Useless 2. Worthless 3. Monument is an emo band from Washington DC. Upbeat emo in the vein of Braid or Cap'n Jazz and the like. "SWEATPANTS FEVER" was originally released as limited to 100 copies only cassette from KEEP IT TOGETHER for supporting their tour. and sold out at the first show. Now Waterslide reissue this release with  bonus songs taken from a 4 way split 7" from COUNT YOUR LUCKY STARS(run by Keith from EMPIRE! EMPIRE! (I WAS A LONELY ESTATE), and their self release debut 7" 3 songs. These 12 tracks are all appearing for the first time on CD. "SWEATPANTS FEVER" has 4 covers, one song picked by each member of the band. Those songs are originally SUPERCHUNK, WIRE, DESCENDENTS, and BRAID. If you're into the 90's emo revival, you should check out this young talented American band. Recorded by Joe from ALGERNON CADWALLADER - you know what sounds like.

Oi! Oi! - Yorkshire’s finest (and only) sports themed Oi! band is ready to hit you for six and whip your bails off with their debut album! description:
**IN STOCK NOW!!!**
FOR FANS OF: SONIC AVENUES, MOTHER’S CHILDREN, SEDATIVES, GENTLEMEN JESSE, MARKED MEN, SCREECHING WEASEL, THE QUEERS, SKIMMER, POINTED STICKS, DICKIES, BUZZCOCKS, REAL KIDS, UNDERTONES The STEVE ADAMYK BAND are a bunch of obnoxious, rowdy, 'kids' from Ottawa, Ontario. While the name would automatically draw comparison to a blues, jazz or rock band given the layout, make no mistake; the STEVE ADAMYK BAND are a punk band. The SAB play trash-pop inspired by seventies punk, the skinny tie bands of the eighties and nineties garage rock. From the ashes of Million Dollar Marxists (Gearhead Records) and Sedatives (P.Trash Records), the group was born out of necessity - a whack load of orphan songs with no band to call home. Frustrated playing in bands the would eventually call it quits, Adamyk formed a band that could have an endless timeline, even if the name is outside of the standard band name zone. This third album is exclusively released on CD Format by Waterslide Records (vinyl version on US label Dirtnap). • Japanese import CD of the bran new (third) STEVE ADAMYK BAND album • Packaged in special oversized rigid car wallet with teabag • CD version exclusively worldwide on Waterslide (Japan) • For Fans of : BUZZCOCKS, SCREECHING WEASEL, THE QUEERS etc etc TRACKLIST 1. name: Spermbirds / Walter Elf - Don't Forget The Fun split 7" EP Reissue Limited Edition
description:
**BACK IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

"Don't Forget The Fun" is the remastered reissue of the split single debut of two of Germany's most important and classic bands, and was originally released in 1986 on X-Mist Records. SPERMBIRDS to many ARE German hardcore punk, punk as fuck: fast, furious, powerful, inventive with lyrics by ex-GI Lee Hollis, full of cynicism/spite on one hand and love of life on the other. their side contains three tracks, incl. "My God Rides a Skateboard" in a different version, plus the rare "Shit rolls down hill" and "She's got VD". Die Walter Elf: Was the alter ego of SPERMBIRDS, being influenced by melodic US punk rock in the vein of Descendents and early 80s British bands like Undertones, Chelsea and Stiff Little Fingers. They deliver two tracks: "Kaiserslautern", a homage to their hometown Kaiserslautern, and "15 Bier", which deals with unrequited love and, as a consequence, drinking too much alcohol. The Vinyl comes with lyric sheet and liner notes by Lee and Beppo. STRICTLY LIMITED AMOUNTS AVAILABLE - FIRST COME , FIRST SERVED!!!** Tracklisting: A1. Spermbirds - My God Rides A Skateboard A2. Spermbirds - Shit Rolls Down Hill A3. Spermbirds - She's Got VD B1. Walter Elf - Fünfzehn Bier B2. Walter Elf - Kaiserslautern

name: TV Smith - Lucky Us: Unreleased Songs And Demos Volume 2 1983-1986 CD
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

“Lucky Us” is the second installment of the unreleased songs and demos of TV Smith, following on from 2010’s critically acclaimed “Sparkle In The Mud”. This time, the 22 previously unreleased tracks concentrate on the period from 1983-1986, between TV SMITH’s EXPLORERS breaking up and the release of the “Channel 5” album through to the formation of TV SMITH’S CHEAP. All 22 tracks have never been commercially released before, and in effect compile what would have been two “missing” albums. TV SMITH has seen a spike of interest in him and his back catalogue since the transmission of the hour long TV documentary “We Who Wait” as part of BBC4’s “Punk Britannia” season back in June, and this has brought his solo work after the ADVERTS to a host of new fans adding to his existing passionate fanbase. “Lucky Us” has been titled as a fitting tribute to Tim Cross, TV’s long time collaborator who sadly died in July this year after a battle with lung cancer whilst this album was being compiled.

name: Frogs Of War - All Said And Done CD
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

FROGS OF WAR hailed from Huddersfield and existed from 1987-1992, in which time they left the world with a solitary kick ass mini album as well as a handful of other tracks that remained unreleased – until now, two decades later! A lost gem, the band split up in 1992 . Hugely influenced at the time by the likes of HDQ, SNUFF and their hometown contemporaries the INSTIGATORS, the entire studio recorded output by the band has been compiled onto CD for the first time as part of the acclaimed Boss Tuneage Retro Series. Apart from the LP, “Waves Of” also originally appeared on the “Floor 81” comp LP – all other tracks were never officially released beyond demo tapes. Digitally remastered and with liner notes from the band, these archive recordings are a must for all fans of UK melodic hardcore punk.

name: Too Much Music, Too Many Bands: 20 Years Of Boss Tuneage 4xCD set
description:
A GREAT WAY TO SAMPLE OUR RELEASES!!!! ABOUT:

Celebrating 20 years of BOSS TUNEAGE, we have come a long way since our first release in 1990 (the GOOBER PATROL / VEHICLE DEREK split 7”) – over 280 releases have followed in the past two decades, and this 4CD boxset celebrates and documents the history of Boss Tuneage - and has been the biggest project we have ever undertaken!
CD1 is entitled "the originals” and contains an overview of some of the standout tracks from our standout releases past and present, CD2 is entitled “the reissues” and features tracks taken from the Boss Tuneage Retro Series imprint, CD3 is subtitled “the covers” and features Boss Tuneage bands performing cover versions of other bands from the label (the vast majority have been specially recorded for this release) whilst CD4 contains rare, unreleased and out of print recordings from the archives – many of which have never been on CD before.
In total, 120 tracks, including 27 previously unreleased with a further 50 tracks either out of print or never been on CD before. Coupled with a thick booklet containing extensive liner notes including a full and detailed discography and lots of memorabilia and previously unseen photos, this 4CD set is strictly limited to 1000 copies worldwide and will not be repressed, so represents a stunning document of the first twenty years of our label.

name: Dan - Thology Double CD Reissue
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!!** ABOUT:

Re-released due to popular demand – available again for the first time in over 3 years! DAN were one of the leading lights of the UK anarcho/DIY punk scene of the late 80s. “Thology” is a stunning 64 track double CD which includes everything the band ever recorded, all on CD for the first time! The bands initial releases were on the seminal 1980s UK punk label Meantime, run by bassist Ian Armstrong. “Thology” contains the debut “can you Dig It” 7”, the three studio albums (“Where Have All The Children Gone”, “An Attitude Hits” and “Mother With Child And Bunny”), their solitary session for the John Peel Show, and final live album “Kicking Ass At TJ’s”. The 20 page booklet contains all lyrics, gigography, liner notes from the band and Sean Forbes (Rough Trade Shop), plus unseen photos and memorabilia from the bands personal collection. Band members would later go on to bands such as SOFA HEAD, LEATHERFACE and WAT TYLER amongst many others! A must have release for anyone with an interest in late 80s UK punk.

name: Desecrator - Subconscious Release CD
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

“Subconscious Release” was the solitary album by DESECRATOR, and was originally released in January 1991. Since that time it has become somewhat of an old school death metal gem – the original vinyl album commands a high second hand price and is highly sought after, as it was only originally pressed in a small limited amount. This is a shining example of early UK Death Metal, with a style similar to somewhere between early DEATH, AUTOPSY and PARADISE LOST. Now more than two decades on, “Subconscious Release” is made available again as part of the series of classic late 80s/early 90s metal reissues by Mosh Tuneage, and for the very first time on CD! Released in conjunction with the band and original label RKT, and featuring a four song demo courtesy of the band themselves as bonus tracks, plus of course the original stunning Dan Seagrave cover artwork, this is a must own for all fans of the death genre.

description:
ABOUT:

Drive Were One Of The Greatest Punk Rock Bands To Come Out Of The Uk During The Classic Late 80's/Early 90's Era, Along With The Likes Of Snuff, Leatherface, Mega City Four And The Senseless Things. Signed To The First Strike Label, Run Out Of Alan's Record Shop In Wigan (One Of The Very Few Places In The Uk At The Time Where You Could Buy U.S. Underground Punk Records) The Band Quickly Rose Out Of Their Local Scene And Were Regular Visitors To Top End Of The Much Missed 'Indie Chart'. This Cd Brings Together All Of The Bands Previously Released (And Long Out Of Print) Material, Including The Classic 'No Girls' And 'Go Out Be Happy' Singles As Well As The Frankie Stubbs (Leatherface) Produced Out Freakage Album. name: Exit Condition - Bite Down Hard / Impact Time CD
description:
**IN STOCK NOW! ** ABOUT:

EXIT CONDITION were one of the finest UKHC bands from the late Eighties. Now Boss Tuneage gives their back catalogue a more comprehensive overview across two CD re-issues and three limited vinyl LP reissues. “Bite Down hard/Impact Time” is the first of the releases, a 23 track CD retrospective taking in the bands recorded output of 1988 and 1989 – and features 18 tracks that have never been released on CD before. The album contains the original “Impact Time” demo from 1988 that led to the bands debut “Bite Down Hard” 7”EP released by Pusmort in 1989, plus six tracks recorded in 1988/1989 that appeared on various compilation LPs at the time – plus a track, “To The Rescue” that has remained criminally unreleased to this point. With all tracks being digitally remastered, and the booklet containing liner notes from drummer Richard Stanier, plus photos and memorabilia from the bands personal collection, this is a must have release for fans of the whole UKHC scene. This release also available on limited edition coloured vinyl LP - see our other listings for details!

name: Exit Condition - 1988-1994 CD
description:
ABOUT:

BACK IN STOCK! EXIT CONDITION were one of the finest and first of the UK melodic hardcore bands from the UK. This 23 track CD retrospective , compiled by the band themselves, includes tracks from their very first legendary” Impact Time” demo, through to tracks from their final split 7” single on Japanese Snuffy Smile label in 1994. All tracks have been remastered and appear on CD for the first time, including tracks from their 1991 BBC Peel Session, which have never been released before. From the fast melodic thrash of their early years (which lead to a debut single on the legendary US Pusmort label), to the more Leatherface / Husker melodic driving punk of their legendary solitary album “Days Of Wild Skies” released originally on Meantime, they were one the finest bands of their era and this album serves as a fitting testament to a band whose influence is still prevalent today.

name: Former Cell Mates - Presented As A Work Of Fiction Digipack CD
description:
IN STOCK NOW!

ABOUT:

With third album “Presented As A Work Of Fiction”, FORMER CELL MATES have come of age, and finally delivered on all they have promised up until now. This is their masterpiece – melodic punk (showing a nod to singer / guitarist David Lee Burdon’s old band LEATHERFACE) gets hit side on by a healthy dose of classic rock and even a touch of soul through David’s emotional raw vocals. The song writing is complemented by the addition of a brass section and piano into the mix which adds another dimension to FORMER CELL MATES’ rocking tunes, making them stand out from the rest of the pack and taking things to the next level amongst their peers. “Presented As A Work Of Fiction” is not only a collection of the finest songs FORMER CELL MATES have written to date, but is also the album you always knew they had in them! The packaging also complements the songs, with the CD version in a digipack with full colour booklet, and the vinyl version on strictly limited edition coloured vinyl in a heavyweight sleeve.
This is a co-release with Poison City Records of Australia - in Australia and New Zealand please order directly from Poison City.

description:
ABOUT:

GAN hailed from North Lincolnshire and were one of the prominent second wave of UK hardcore pop-punk bands to emerge in the early 90s after the likes of SNUFF and LEATHERFACE. Do That Again? ...Again?!? compiles everything they ever recorded, all of which has been unavailable for over a decade, including not only the Do That Again album (originally released on SMR in 1992 and currently fetching over £100 on the collectors market in Japan), but the Blink” 7 (Popkid Records 1993), Water Powered Teenies 7" (Vinyl Japan 1995) and Pigdog 7” from 1996, as well as their live favourite , the cover of 99 Red Balloons previously unreleased. All 24 tracks have been digitally remastered and features 11 songs previously unavailable on CD before. Compiled with liner notes from the band and many unseen photos. Members of GAN went on to form ONE CAR PILE UP, who remain active to this day with releases on Damaged Goods and Crackle.

Since their formation last year, the band (Freddy Skintoft, W.G Disgrace, Devon Malcolm Mclaren and Spike Gatting) have started to build a committed fan base through their unique live shows with sing-a-long Oi! classics such as “Darts Players Wives” and “LBW” (Lager Before Women) all played with tongue firmly in cheek! The cover art and album title also gives more than a nod in the direction of Oi! Godfathers, The 4-Skins! Coming to a cricket pavilion near you soon….

name: The Hard Ons - Alfalfa Males Once Summer Is Done Conform Or Die CD (w/free 6 song bonus download)
description:
ABOUT:

With an epic and infamous disregard for popular trends and nice haircuts, the three quasi-virtuosos that are Australian legends THE HARD ONS are back with their first new studio album in three years – and with an album that truly represents the Hard-Ons at their most realised: melodic; brutal; and funny. “ALFALFA MALES ONCE SUMMER IS DONE CONFORM OR DIE” is at once a face-peeling thrash-metal album, slash-and-burn punk album and a brilliantly catchy power-pop album. But you would expect that from a band that for a quarter of a century laughed at the mainstream and deliberately shunned it; a band that gloriously does what it instinctively feels; paradoxically, a band that carefully and organically crafts its musical output with the utmost respect that it deserves.

In this era of downloading, social-networking and over-the-top consumerism, the world needs, as outrageous as this sounds, the new album from three shirtless middle-aged men who still play like they are the only band on the planet..
BOSS TUNEAGE EXCLUSIVE: Free 6 song download code with every order from us, featuring 5 unreleased demo versions of tracks on the album plus totally exclusive unreleased Studio track "Will You Fuck Off About What Tomorrow Will Bring"!

name: HDQ - Sinking CD
description:
ABOUT:

HDQ were one of the leading lights of the UKHC scene in the late 80s and early 90s, and one of the first bands alongside the likes of SNUFF to embrace the more melodic US hardcore approach of bands like DAG NASTY. Now their back catalogue gets an exhaustive and extensive re-issue as part of THE BOSS TUNEAGE RETRO SERIES. Still hugely influential today, 75% of the Sunderland based band went on to become members of UK punk legends LEATHERFACE. HDQ’s second – and arguably best - album “Sinking” from 1989 has not been widely available for well over 15 years, and never commercially released on CD before in the UK. Here it has been re-mastered, with full and detailed liner notes from bassist Rob Bewick and features 12 previously unreleased tracks on any format, including the bands first session for the John Peel Show.

Heresy is one of the most influential UK Hardcore Punk bands ever to exist. From 1985-1989 the band were one of the leading lights of the rapidly expanding UK scene. name: Heresy - 1987 DVD
description:
ABOUT:

HERESY need little introduction – legendary UK Hardcore pioneers, in their brief existence from 1985-1989 they defined an era. To co-incide with a trilogy of collectors CD/LP reissues of their recorded output, Boss Tuneage is proud to present this wonderful collectors archive DVD. Filmed totally DIY punk style on a single camcorder by their tour manager, “1987” follows the band on a tour of Belgium and Holland, featuring ultra rare live appearances and 17 full out blasting live songs to frenzied crowds! In addition to this, there are also some classic never seen before “behind the scenes” footage of the band and roadies which shows the bands humorous side too! There is also some remarkable archive footage of the band in the recording studio, recording the legendary “Thanks” 7” single! A must for those who there at the time, or any fan of this legendary UKHC Band, caught at the top of their game!

Please note: This DVD has been digitally restored as best as possible from the original 20 year old video cassette tape, but this is a true DIY punk lo-fi recording, and not a multi-camera angle swish MTV affair!!

name: Ipanema - Ipanema CD (Anthology)
description:
ABOUT:

The unexpected and tragic death of Darren “Wiz” Brown on 6th Dec 2006 was a shock to many people. He was a greatly respected and extraordinary musician and writer who touched the lives of many through his work with MEGA CITY FOUR, DOUGHBOYS, SERPICO and most recently IPANEMA.We had been releasing records by Wiz’s bands over the previous six years and had built up not only a great working relationship but also a great friendship with IPANEMA. The question was – how best to honour Wiz? The only answer could be through his music. The result is a magnificent 17 track CD, containing these 9 unreleased recordings plus the out of print “Baseball Bat/Skull” 7” from 2003 and the “Me Me Me” mini album from 2005. Everything that IPANEMA recorded.All monies raised by the sale of this CD are being donated by Boss Tuneage directly to the Forward 4 Wiz Trust. Creativity matters. Inspiration matters. Music matters. More information on the trust can be found at www.myspace.com/f4wt

name: The Magnificent - Pay The Crimes CD
description:
ABOUT:

The Magnificent is Jimmy Islip (vocals / guitar), Matt Colmer (vocals / guitar), Charlie Batten (drums) & Carl Glover (bass). They have been playing music together since their pre-teens (including That Fucking Tank, Buzzkill and Eighty Six) until finally settling as the Magnificent in late 2006. Their music has been compared to popular U.S punk stuff like Rancid, Gaslight Anthem, Green Day and The Hold Steady to name a few but their sound is definitely English and owes more to the Clash than anything else. ‘Pay The Crimes’ is their first full-length album and showcases their honest lyrics and straight-up song writing. The album features contributions from Paul Rafferty of HOT CLUB DE PARIS and Rob Taylor from Wakefield band PYLON.

name: Monks Of Science / Default - Inspirations And Escalations : Complete Recordings 1987-1992 CD
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

DEFAULT hailed from Peterborough and featured ex members of DESECRATORS. Their solitary 7” EP released in 1987 “Inspiration” is widely regarded as a UK Hardcore classic, and was the first release on the First Strike label (who later released JAILCELL RECIPES and DRIVE). When vocalist Loyd left, DEFAULT ceased to be in 1989, and the remaining members recruited bassist Stuart West and changed their name to MONKS OF SCIENCE, under which they recorded and released an album “I’m A Doctor Not An Escalator” for In Your Face Records in 1990. This 28 track compilation reissue compiles all the studio recordings of both DEFAULT and MONKS OF SCIENCE, and is digitally re-mastered – all tracks have never been available on CD, with a further 12 previously unavailable commercially – including the MONKS OF SCIENCE final studio recordings from 1992, and the DEFAULT “Faith Or Fraud” demo from 1987. Featuring liner notes from the band as well as many unseen photos and memorabilia, including a full gig listing for both bands, this is a must have collection for fans of UK Hardcore. The band can currently be found playing in PSYCHO BOMBS, with the exception of bassist Stuart West, who currently plays bass in THE DAMNED.

Mainstays of the UK punk scene of the late 80s and early 90s, bassist Ian also ran legendary UK punk label Meantime records. name: Spermbirds - Me & My People Double DVD
description:
ABOUT:

For the first time ever, German’s legendary hardcore band, The Spermbirds are filmed doing what they do best – playing live. This double DVD features a live 80-minute film (professionally recorded) of the “Boys are Back in K-Town” show recorded in December 2005 in Kaiserslautern where the band celebrated their 20-year anniversary together with over 1200 fans. Disc two of the DVD also contains "Me and My People”, a two hour documentary (produced by the band) that tells the Spermbirds story in their own words about the bands conception, the splits, the reconciliations, the records and a host of strange experiences over their 20 year history. This is coupled with exclusive behind the scenes footage of their tours in South Africa and Europe. In addition the DVD contains a gallery of pictures, posters and flyers taken from their personal collections. With nearly four hours of footage, this is a must for not only any SPERMBIRDS fan, but also anyone with an interest in hardcore punk. Both DVDs are Multi-region with worldwide playability.

name: Spermbirds - Something To Prove / Nothing Is Easy CD
description:
ABOUT:

The term "classic hardcore punk album" must be one of the most overused phrases, but in the case of the SPERMBIRDS legendary debut album from 1986, its more than valid. Hailing from Kaiserslauten and featuring ex US serviceman Lee Hollis on vocals, the debut SPERMBIRDS album was fast and furious punk rock influenced by US hardcore bands such as BLACK FLAG, 7 SECONDS and ANGRY SAMOANS. Mainland Europe's most successful hardcore band are still going strong 20 years on, and "Something To Prove" remains the starting point / first port of call to anyone checking out the band. Now re-mastered and reissued as a 30 track digipack CD, containing the "Nothing Is Easy" album plus 6 bonus tracks (including the ultra rare debut split 7" tracks with WALTER ELF, previously unavailable on CD)

name: Stupids - Complete BBC Peel Sessions CD
description:
ABOUT:

THE STUPIDS were the legendary UK Hardcore Punk pioneers who, in three short years from 1984 to 1987 went from 4 track demos to the front cover of NME and Sounds and Indie Number 1 Chart albums. The first hardcore band to record a session for the John Peel Show, to openly embrace US Hardcore punk within their sound and style, THE STUPIDS paved the way for the whole UKHC scene and “Britcore” explosion that followed. The Godfathers of UK Skate Punk now finally get the reissues their back catalogue deserves, and the first time any STUPIDS reissues have been done with the complete involvement and backing of the band themselves. Four years in the making, the six part STUPIDS discography series with the bonus unreleased tracks and packaging making them the must-own versions for any hardcore punk fan.

“THE COMPLETE BBC PEEL SESSIONS” contains the bands three Peel Sessions plus the solitary FRANKFURTER Peel Session!

description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

It is an absolute travesty that TRENCH FEVER only released one solitary 7”EP and a handful of comp appearances. Formed in 1988 when drummer Jason Cook and bassist Paul Condon left BAD DRESS SENSE, and teamed up with vocalist Neil Singleton (ex DESTRUCTORS) and guitarists Dave Sophocleus and Paul Lyne, TRENCH FEVER get the Boss Tuneage reissue treatment – “Saturday Night Trench Fever” compiles all tracks recorded by the band between 1988 and 1992, when the band split up under the weight of drummer Jason and guitarist Paul’s BLAGGERS ITA commitments. All 19 tracks have been digitally re-mastered and appear on CD format for the first time, a further 11 tracks having been previously unreleased commercially before! Featuring liner notes from the band plus photos this is a fitting document to one of the finest bands to come out of the late 80s UK hardcore punk scene.

name: TV Smith - Crossing The Red Sea With The Adverts (Live CD)
description:
ABOUT:

TV Smith rose to prominence in the first wave of British punk rock as singer and songwriter for The Adverts who, after frequent early appearances at the seminal Roxy club in London in 1977, gained cult success with the Stiff single "One Chord Wonders". This turned to notoriety when their next single, "Gary Gilmore's Eyes" thrust them into the upper reaches of the UK Charts. The album that followed "Crossing The Red Sea With The Adverts" charted on its first week of release and is generally considered to be one of the few genuine classics of the era. Recorded in April 2007 in front of an enthusiastic sellout crowd at the legendary 100 Club, TV Smith and The Bored Teenagers turned the clock back 30 years and performed that defining classic album in sequence and in full. The vinyl-effect CD also contains 5 encores from the evening, including the legendary "Gary Gilmore's Eyes".

name: TV Smith - Sparkle In The Mud:Unreleased Songs And Demos Volume 1 - 1979-83 CD
description:
ABOUT:

The best things sometimes come to those who wait and this is the one that fans of TV SMITH have been waiting for. Following the demise of THE ADVERTS, TV SMITH continued to demo and write songs alongside his work as TV SMITH AND THE GREAT EXPLORERS, as well as solo album “CHANNEL 5”, which up until now have been unheard. Now, as part of the acclaimed Boss Tuneage Retro Series, “SPARKLE IN THE MUD” compiles 21 of these previously unreleased demo recordings, with a staggering 16 songs appearing for the very first time. To all intents and purposes, these recordings represent the “lost” TV SMITH albums from the early 80’s. A unique collection from one of the punk legends, this is simply essential listening.

name: TV Smith - Coming In To Land Digipack CD
description:
IN STOCK NOW!

ABOUT:

IN 1977 TV SMITH WAS CROSSING THE RED SEA WITH THE ADVERTS... IN 2011 HE IS COMING IN TO LAND
33 years after “Crossing The Red Sea With The Adverts” TV Smith comes up with an album to rival the urgency, energy and pure punk ethic of his debut. The new masterpiece “Coming In To Land” captures the spirit of 2011 as surely as the Adverts captured the spirit of ’77. With lacerating lyrics and melodies that refuse to leave the head, these twelve brand new songs cast a scorching light on the current state of the world. Recorded in Germany and the UK with a hand-picked and tight-knit network of friends – Vom Ritchie (Die Toten Hosen), BB Quattro (Suzy & Los Quattro, Bored Teenagers), Tim Cross (Adverts) – and mixed in a studio in the snow-bound wilds of deepest Finland with maverick engineer Jarkko Heiniö (Tiger Bombs, King Of All The Animals), “Coming In To Land” marks a new career highpoint for TV Smith. Luxuriously packaged in a dipack with 16 page full colour booklet!

description:
ABOUT:

Norfolk’s VANILLA POD are one of the most consistent touring bands in the UK pop-punk underground and are back with their fifth album and first new recordings in five years. We think it’s easily their best offering to date which showcases many a fine song you may already recognise from their live set. Sharing members with bands such as TOY DOLLS, BILLY NO MATES and GOOBER PATROL, the POD have even enlisted Olga from the TOY DOLLS to lay down some guitar on this album. POETS ON PAYDAY features nine brand new tracks complemented by two previously unreleased bonus tracks from the sessions for their two previous albums (Surrounded By Idiots and Third Time Lucky) capturing VANILLA POD at their melodic best.

name: Wanton Thought - Wanton Thought Limited Edition CD
description:
**IN STOCK NOW!** ABOUT:

The latest installment in our retro series sees us digging deep into the archives to bring you the first of a series of limited edition CD reissues by lesser known but no less great UK Hardcore punk bands from the late 80s and early 90s! WANTON THOUGHT hailed from North Wales and played cracking melodic hardcore punk akin to early SNUFF, HDQ and INSTIGATORS - although they split up before recording their album for Full Circle in 1991, they left us with one kickass 7"EP (the third release on Boss Tuneage) and one track on the "Floor 81" comp LP. This 10 track, 40 minute CD features not only these tracks, but also their second demo from 1989 (of which a version of "Normal School Day" featured on Meantime Records "Spleurk 2" comp LP at the time) plus - their finest recorded tune - "In The Glue" - which had criminally remained unreleased until now! A cracking little CD which just shows what a cracking band WANTON THOUGHT were - and this is a must for any fans of late 80s/early 90s UK scene stuff! Digitally remastered and features liner notes from Drummer Craig Williams.

FORMAT: Limited Edition CD

name: X One Way X/Youth Of Strength - Split LP + Free 7 "
description:
ABOUT:

Gird your loins for X ONE WAY X and YOUTH OF STRENGTH – a 31 track split album of ferocious straight edge inspired hardcore with tongue firmly in cheek! Hailing from New Jersey, X ONE WAY X is the side project of Bill Henderson (THURSDAY, THE PROCEEDURE, BETWEEN THE WARS) – a true phenomenon of MySpace, after “Generic Hardcore Song” found its way onto the site the band have received in excess of 60,000 plays which led to their debut album on Underground Communique in 2005. Their side of the split album – entitled “Start Whenever” (a nod to GORILLA BISCUITS) features 10 brand new tracks. On the flipside are self proclaimed legendary Boston (UK, not USA) straight edge hardcore band YOUTH OF STRENGTH who allegedly inspired the whole straight edge scene with demo tapes in the mid 80s that were the main influence on YOUTH OF TODAY and CHAIN OF STRENGTH. After their 20 year old demo “Shouting For A Better Tomorrow” was released on 7” in late 2005, the bands notoriety spread throughout the hardcore scene, the band have subsequently reformed and re-recorded some of their old material with brand new songs – as displayed on the 21 tracks of their side of the album, entitled (YOUTH OF TODAY fans turn away now!) “WE’RE NOT IN THIS TO BREAK DOWN THE WALLS ALONE”... inspirational band or just a bunch of thirty-somethings messing around with too much time on their hands? You decide! In addition to the 31 tracks on the LP, there is also a bonus CD included featuring an extra 28 tracks – that’s an eye watering 59 tracks in total – bonus tracks include the original X ONE WAY X demo and the YOS “Shouting For A Better Tomorrow” 7” plus additional unreleased recordings.

FORMAT: 12” Vinyl LP with bonus 59 track CD plus FREE YOS 7"

name: Bambix - The Storytailor CD
description:
The Storytailor, a craftsman who tangles stories like clothes, spinning words, sowing storylines and who is able to change stories with every needle or add lines with every thread. That Storytailor is the basis of a new Bambix album. An album containing 12 very different new songs. Ranging from heavy, melancholic, cheerful, powerful tunes to a personal acoustic one . Recorded by Nico van Montfort (Heidevolk, Earth Crisis, Antillectual) who completely understood Bambix’ vision, giving the songs the intensity they need. After 20 years in the game, Bambix are still going and are still as bratty as ever, sneering as they tackle their favourite subjects in which they stand up for the underdog, the only lonely at the bar, the ones that have their hearts dripping on the floor, outcasts, a better world where  ties are made to be broken, the individual keeps on shouting and refuses to be a lame couch potato. This time front woman Wick Bambix deals with very personal matters like the death of her father and the birth of son Silas. Cover was designed by Larkin, a surreal NY artist, whose two paintings are showing a hare and a fox, Victorian style, in quilted suits. Storytailored suits. Enemies they are, with their own stories but yet of the same family, it seems.

name: Prophecy Of Doom - Total Mind War CD
description:
Artist: PROPHECY OF DOOM

Title: Total Mind War

Label: SELFMADEGOD RECORDS

Format: CD

Country: England

Genre: Grind / Death Metal


Product description:

We at Selfmadegod are proud to release Prophecy of Doom, one of the bands that truly broke the barriers between the hardcore scene, death metal and grindcore from the late 80's. One of the heaviest and most destructive bands coming from the UK, always loyal to their punk attitude and with a strong concern on lyrics. After a demo in 1988, they have released "Calculated Mind Rape" 7"EP in 1989, then in 1990 the output on Peaceville the band is mostly known for, "Acknowledge the Confusion Master" LP (also released as a split CD with AXEGRINDER), in the same year they released live 7"EP ("Until the Again") and the "Peel Sessions" 12". After the "Matrix" CD in 1992 (on Metalcore), their last output was the 3-song demo "Ego Death Grind" in 1996. This CD compiles an unreleased radio session from 1991 plus the complete "Ego Death Grind" demo 1996. Now you have a chance to complete your POD discography with some of their best stuff ever.


Tracklisting:

1. Raze Against Time
2. Onward Ever Backward
3. Acknowledge the Confusion Master
4. The Voice of Tibet (Our Shame and Hypocrisy)
5. Biolitics
6. Protogenesis
7. Axis (Development) Access

name: Satanic Malfunctions - Disgrace To Music 112 track Double CD
description:
Released by Self made God Records in Poland . From their website..

A complete discography of one of the greatest bands to come out of United Kingdom is finally unleashed!
Double disc; 112 songs in total taken from: "Who Wants The World" EP (1986), "I Have Just Had All I Can Take" 7"EP (1987), songs from the split 7"EP w/ SM-70 (1988), "Teacore" 7"EP (1988), "Hellbound" LP (1988), "Disgrace To Humanity" LP (1989) and "Splitting Headache" 4-Way Split (1986). For the first time on CD! All recordings taken directly from vinyl to keep that awesome old days feeling.
Ranging from mid-tempo punk rock tunes to ultra fast noisecore/thrash songs with political lyrics, this is what SATANIC MALFUNCTIONS were all about.
A lesson of punk, hardcore, noisecore, thrash, grind history that has started long time ago along with bands like DISCHARGE, NAPALM DEATH, L'ARM, HERESY, SORE THROAT, FEAR OF GOD, ACTIVE MINDS, and inspired dozens of bands all over the world.
Insert includes liner notes written by Ade himself, an interview and clippings. This is a must have for fans of extremely fast punk, thrash and noise and above mentioned bands!

LImited Copies Available!

name: Anihilated - Path To Destruction 12" Mini LP
description:
Review from Discogs..

Another quality reissue on Agipunk. Ipswich/UK Anihilated formed in 1980 as Prospex and deeply involved in the anarcho-punk scene. They soon started to add metal to their music, the first in UK playing this kind of crossover along with Onslaught, Sacrilege and Concrete Sox. This 12" EP has been originally released in 1986 and for the first time is re-released on vinyl. A true gem that you need to own next to "Behind the realms of madness and "Power from hell". Original cover artwork drawn back in the days by Mid/Deviated Instinct. Comes with original insert plus a new insert with a lot of never seen pictures, commentaries and lyrics. 

A1 		Innocent Victims 		
A2 		Anihilated 		
B1 		Thunderflash 		
B2 		Shadows Of Fear

"Kingmaker" is the debut album from Pine Barrens, following on from a very well-received demo that came out in 2010. Pine Barrens efficiently fuse hardcore punk to black metal, among other things, to create an intense and surprisingly catchy experience. For those that care, the band features current and ex-members of Beecher, Atavist, Extinction of Mankind, The Ergon Carousel and Hammers.

Werewolves totally step up to the plate, 4 of their final songs, each one killer. These songs maybe my favourite ones they have done, sucks that they will be no more. This band slay, for fans of New Bomb Turks/ Melvins/ UK82.

name: Dude Jams / Pure Graft - split 7"EP
description:
1 	Dude Jams - Putting The X In PUNX 		 
2 	Dude Jams - Songs About Dying 		 
3 	Pure Graft - Blatant Localism 		 
4 	Pure Graft - David Dimbleby 

From the NOt Shy Of the DIY website - 

DUDE JAMS
currently reside in Austin Texas, influenced upon a steady diet of BONG RIPS, RANCID, TECATE, and TACO BELL, DUDE JAMS have been putting the X in PUNX since the mid '00s. DUDE JAMS have done a few splits with the likes of DUMBSPRINGER, TOO MANY DAVES and JONESIN' but to name a few, DUDE JAMS have extensively toured the U.S.A a whole bunch through 2007-2010. DUDE JAMS recently took a break from the touring scene to concentrate on the the couch for the start of new seasons of Jersey Shore and Ghost Hunters. DUDE JAMS released their critically acclaimed hit PUNK album 'How To Abuse Everything' on A.D.D Records last year. In 2012 DUDE JAMS toured the Mid-West. DUDE JAMS is the best band name in history.

PURE GRAFT
The history of Pure Graft started a long time ago in Newcastle, England when the young friends Simon Hubbard, Danny Lester, Ben Ralston, Mark Thompson and Chris McManus (born Michael Ryan Pritchard) formed their first band Sweet Children. In 2005 they changed their name to PURE GRAFT and PURE GRAFT released their first DEMO which brought the band 3 fans, 2 gigs and eventually a record deal. They got signed to an independent label Specialist Subject Records which released their first split 10" with EINENCALVINKLEINSBALLS, KAVES, and BIG SHITTY PLAN.

Soon after the release another change came – Mark Thompson quit the band and was replaced by David Hillier (born Frank Edwin Wright III) who became Pure Graft’s permanent easy loving guitarist. Pure Graft were becoming more and more popular due to the arrival of sexy dave and soon after the release of their second split 7 e.p with BEASTS their success was so obvious that the band began getting offers from COOL record labels. Eventually, Pure Graft decided to sign a verbal agreement with NOT SHY OF THE DIY RECORDS.

In the spring of 2010 Pure Graft released their 7" split with LITTLE LEAGUE on SSR which was a huge success. It eventually sold over 100 copies worldwide.

In Sept 2012 PURE GRAFT released their split 7" with DUDE JAMS on NOT SHY OF THE DIY RECORDS. The success and popularity of the band brought not only joy and at least 50 new fans. PURE GRAFT are once again playing the Fest in Florida this year headlining the main stage on the opening night such is their popularity.

In 2013 PURE GRAFT are all set to work upon their debut album The Geordie Idiot.

name: Permaculture - Swallow What Your Given 7"EP
description:
On Inflammable Material 
For those who missed the tape (which has been remastered for this EP), Permaculture are members of Social Cirkle, Confines and Nuclear Family. 4 tracks of modern Peace Punk/Anarcho, reminiscent of Penis Envy-era Crass but with contemporary hardcore precision
Vinyl pressing of the great Permaculture tape that came out a few months ago. Here's what I wrote about it then:
"Great new band from Boston featuring members of Social Circkle, Confines and Nuclear Family who play peace punk not unlike Crass, A-Heads, Flux Of Pink Indians etc. The vocals REALLY remind me of Eve Libertine's, and this definitely seems to be going for an all round Penis Envy vibe. Great artwork and lyrics too. Well worth checking out."
﻿
